item.title: A Comparative Study on Reasoning Patterns of OpenAI's o1 Model
item.description: OpenAI’s o1 model surpasses other LLMs in reasoning tasks by employing unique inference strategies, revealing six novel reasoning patterns analyzed across various benchmarks.

item.title: VidPanos: Generative Panoramic Videos from Casual Panning Videos
item.description: VidPanos generates realistic panoramic videos from casual panning videos by cleverly using generative video models to fill in unseen parts of the scene, offering a significant step towards immersive v…

item.title: Long-LRM: Long-sequence Large Reconstruction Model for Wide-coverage Gaussian Splats
item.description: Long-LRM: A groundbreaking 3D reconstruction model generating photorealistic, wide-coverage scenes from 32 images in 1.3 seconds using a novel hybrid architecture.
